noteLab.model
Class Paper

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
          java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float
              noteLab.model.geom.TransformRectangle2D
                  noteLab.model.Paper
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.lang.Cloneable, CopyReady<Paper>, Bounded, Transformable, ModBroadcaster, Renderable, Selectable
public class Paper
extends TransformRectangle2D
implements Renderable, CopyReady<Paper>, Bounded, Selectable

This class represents a piece of paper.

Author:
Dominic Kramer

private boolean isSelected

gridWidth

private float gridWidth
The width of the lines drawn on a piece of graph paper. This method takes into account the amount this paper has been scaled.

collegeWidth

private float collegeWidth
The width of the lines drawn on a colleged ruled piece of paper. This method takes into account the amount this paper has been scaled.

wideWidth

private float wideWidth
The width of the lines drawn on a wide ruled piece paper. This method takes into account the amount this paper has been scaled.

collegeMargin

private float collegeMargin
The width of the margin line drawn on a college ruled piece of paper. This method takes into account the amount this paper has been scaled.

wideMargin

private float wideMargin
The width of the margin line drawn on a wide ruled piece of paper. This method takes into account the amount this paper has been scaled.

cacheImage

private java.awt.image.BufferedImage cacheImage
The image to which this paper is cached to help speed rendering. If this field is null this paper hasn't been cached or its cache is not up to date.

renderLinedPage

                             float lineWidth,
                             float margin)
Informs this paper to render itself as if it were a lined piece of paper with the given distance between lines and given margin.

Parameters:
renderer - The renderer used to render the paper.
lineWidth - The distance between lines on the paper.
margin - The size of the paper's margin.

renderLinesHorizontal

private void renderLinesHorizontal(Renderer2D renderer,
                                   float gap,
                                   float leftMargin,
                                   float rightMargin,
                                   float topMargin,
                                   float bottomMargin)
Informs this paper to render lines across the paper. The lines are not drawn inside the paper's margins as specified.

Parameters:
renderer - The renderer used to render the paper.
gap - The distance between the lines drawn on the paper.
leftMargin - The size of left margin drawn.
rightMargin - The size of the right margin drawn.
topMargin - The size of the top margin drawn.
bottomMargin - The size of the bottom drawn.

                                 float gap,
                                 float leftMargin,
                                 float rightMargin,
                                 float topMargin,
                                 float bottomMargin)
Informs this paper to render lines down the paper. The lines are not drawn inside the paper's margins as specified.

Parameters:
renderer - The renderer used to render the paper.
gap - The distance between the lines drawn on the paper.
leftMargin - The size of left margin drawn.
rightMargin - The size of the right margin drawn.
topMargin - The size of the top margin drawn.
bottomMargin - The size of the bottom drawn.
